moves.6. Be3 e6: Hungarian style Sicilian: we prepare Ne7, d5, and break up the center...
moves.7... Ne7 8. Be2 O-O 9. Bh6 d5: a very convenient time, to introduce d5...
moves.10. Bxg7 Kxg7: this trade has lost its' force...
moves.12. a3 Nbc6 13. f4: too late, to close this Sicilian: Black is unleashed...
moves.18. Rf1 Rac8: preparing Nd4, followed by taking c2...
moves.19. g4: only helping Black, to make the winning move...
